svg.title: AI Runtime Behaviour Security — Complete Tube Map

g.text: Guardrails prevent · Judge detects · Humans decide · Circuit breakers contain
Foundation: 80 infrastructure controls · 4 risk tiers · 3 control layers · PACE resilience
MASO: 6 domains · 93 controls · 99 tests · 3 implementation tiers · 30 emergent risks · dual OWASP coverage
